name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. David Allen SATTAZAHN

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. David Allen SATTAZAHN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
CASTILLE, J., dissents.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Iva C. Dougherty, Mark C. Baldwin, Reading, for Com.
John Elder, Reading, for D.A. Sattazahn.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 293
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. David Allen SATTAZAHN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Iva C. Dougherty, Mark C. Baldwin, Reading, for Com.
John Elder, Reading, for D.A. Sattazahn.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
